excerpt: "In this document, you learn how to use Azure Private Link with your Azure Machine Learning workspace. Azure Private Link enables you to connect to your workspace using a private endpoint. The private endpoint is a set of private IP addresses within your virtual network. You can then limit access to your workspace to only occur over the private ..."
